title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document comprehensive project requirements from various stakeholders such as scientists, AI experts, end-users, potential users from different disciplines. This includes understanding the desired features, use cases, performance metrics, technical constraints, and potential integration with existing systems. The output will be a detailed requirements document.

title: Design AI System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AI system, including data input sources, processing algorithms, and output generation mechanisms.

title: Develop Data Collection Module
description: Create a module to collect data from various scientific disciplines and format it for AI processing.

title: Implement AI Processing Algorithms
description: Develop the algorithms that will combine concepts from different disciplines and generate innovative ideas.

title: Create User Interface for Idea Generation
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for end-users to interact with the system and generate ideas.

title: Test AI System Functionality
description: Perform extensive testing to ensure the system is functioning correctly and generating innovative ideas as intended.

title: Perform System Audit
description: Conduct a comprehensive audit to ensure the system is secure and adheres to all relevant regulations.

title: Deploy AI System for User Testing
description: Prepare the system for deployment and make it available to a limited group of users for testing.

title: Gather User Feedback and Iterate
description: Collaborate with users to gather feedback, analyze it, and iterate on the system based on their experiences, aiming to enhance usability and overall performance. This process will involve regular communication, updates, and documentation for transparency.
dependencies: Deploy AI System for User Testing

title: Iterate on AI System and Improve Performance
description: Make necessary improvements to the system based on user feedback and aim to increase its performance.
